attributes.action: Give Peterborough council funding to purge our drains of rodents.
attributes.additional_details: I have been told that the local council can no longer afford to rid our drains of rodents .I and many others have seen rodents roaming our streets they carry diseases and fleas which are bad for our health and pets .Please sign my petition today to gain the funding needed to sort this problem out.
attributes.background: Since my local council has had to make cuts our drainage systems are no longer purged every winter to stop rodents we now have an epidemic in Peterborough .Local residents are now finding infestations all around the city .Please help to make our city and homes safe and rodent free.

rejection.details:
Decisions about this kind of spending are the responsibility of local councils, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to give Peterborough Council more funding overall. You could use the problems with rodents as an example of why more funding for the council is needed.
